title: Himi 313
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Ko e pule angatonu,
‘A hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū,
‘E hoko mālohi atu,
Ki māmani kotoa pē.
2.
Pea ‘e vete ‘e Sīsū,
‘A e kakai ha’isia;
Pea fakafiefia,
Ki he kakai mafasia.
3.
’I he’ene faka’ilo,
‘Ene ngaahi ngāue lelei,
‘E mole ai ‘ a e mate,
Mo e mala’ia lahi.
4.
Ko e me’a na’e mole,
‘I he ‘uluaki Tamai,
‘E toe ma’u, ‘ia Sīsū,
Ko hotau Fakamo’ui.
5.
Ke tu’u hake kotoa pē,
‘I he loto fiefia,
Pea fakaongo lelei,
’A hotau tu’i ko Sīsū. *
